Name: Pixel Sand
About the game: Want to watch a house being sucked into a black hole? Want to shoot lasers at a frozen lake? Want to set off a nuclear bomb with the sole purpose of destroying bees? Welcome to the world of Pixel Sand! Here are some buzzwords that our marketing department told us not to use: 8 Chapter Campaign - wow Sandbox Mode - what is that? Networked Multiplayer - it kinda works Kids Mode - let them bash keyboards Procedurally Generated World Mode - oh great another one? Downloadable Mods - lol nerds ________________________________________________________________________ Pixel Sand is a fantasy physics platformer of epic indie proportions. Drawing inspiration from Dan-Ball's Powder Game and other games like Falling Sand, World of Sand, & Powder Toy, we've added to the genre with a familiar player named Vuhrne and a ground breaking story. Solve engaging puzzles and experiment with hundreds of elements as you explore your way through the world in campaign mode, or join a friend and create a universe together that is entirely your own. Share your designs with the world in our online mod community and download mod content for endless hours of entertainment.
